story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0100_10: So, I analyzed the stone you gave me.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Although it has properties similar to sync
stones, it’s something different.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0400_10:
Sync stones can release energy by reacting to a
strong bond between a Trainer and a Pokémon.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0500_10: The stone Rei found has similar properties...
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0600_10: But it cannot release energy like sync stones do.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0700_10:
It seems to be even more mysterious than
sync stones...
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0800_10: Oui, I may need to research a little further.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_0900_10:
That’s why I’d like you all to find more stones like
this one.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_1000_10:
The more samples you have, the more different
methods you can try for your research, right?
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_1200_10:
If you can, please also let me know where you
find the stones.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_1300_10:
I’m keen to know why we’re suddenly
discovering them.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_1201_1500_10:
Shall we start by going back to the ruins and
investigating the area?
story_stone_01_02000/2401_0401_1800_10: Sure, let’s split up and ask around.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_0402_2000_10: Let’s ask our friends on Pasio to help, then.
story_stone_01_02000/2401_0402_2100_10:
If we all search different areas, it’ll be easier to
find the strange stones.
